Pearls are collected throughout the game. You can use them in the store to buy items.
Currency is used to buy items from the store.
The plastic shielding is replaced by aluminium, thus reducing the damage taken. The robot can sustain 1 additional hit before breaking down.
A thin titanium plating is still lightweight but provides more damage resistance than the aluminum. The robot can sustain 1 additional hit before breaking down.
The thicker carbon plating requires a bit more powerful jetpack boosters, but provides more damage resistance. The robot can sustain 2 additional hits before breaking down.

The nanobots reposition themselves at the point of impact to provide the best damage resistance. The nanobots require a nuclear energy to function. The robot can sustain 2 additional hits before breaking down.
Adds an additional battery to the jetpack system which increases the air time by 50%.
Replaces the standard batteries with nuclear, which doubles the refill of the jetpack system. Requires a nuclear power cell to sustain the higher power output.
Installs a Garbage Collector which generates pearls from the remains of destroyed enemies. Each enemy destroyed grants 3 pears.
By destroying enemies quickly in a row the Garbage Collector is able to produce even more pearls from multiple remains. For each kill in a row the pearl collection is increased by 50%.

Upgrades the Garbage Collector system with a Crystal Extractor. When enemies are destroyed quickly in a row the crystal extractor has a chance of generating enough materials for producing crystals. The process requires immense amount of power which could only be sustained by a nuclear power cell. Each monster destroyed in a spree has 25% chance of yielding a crystal.
The nuclear power cell is able to generate energy quicker than the standard one. The amount of pearls needed to generate enough energy for the shield is reduced by 5.
The energy stabilizer reduces the amount of energy the shield consumes, which allows the shield to last 5 seconds longer.
Gives you 1000 pearls to use in the Torch Store for buying Upgrades.
